name: OrbitalPong
description:
OrbitalPong

Do you like pong, but lack friends to play it with?
No?
Just me?
Oh... Well none the less, OrbitalPong is the game for you! (If you like games that are like pong).

OrbitalPong was made in just 2 days for #TweetTweetJam using only 555/560 characters. See the source code here.
